title: The Devil Didn't Make Me Do It!
description: A Simple Guide To Understanding Spiritual Warfare. While many sincere and naïve Christians are led into satan’s deceptive schemes, this book will help readers to overcome oppressive obstructions caused by evil spirits, so that they may freely say, “The devil didn’t make me do it!” Though the subject matter expressed herein may be a sobering realization that there are demons ‘round ev’ry corner, it is the intent of this writing to assure every believer that “where sin abounds, God’s grace, power and authority abounds much more.”
author: Linda  Montgomery
